overview: Cargo is a 5-minute short film about a man ( Sven Nordin ) coming to an office to send many packets. Clerk ( Rune Temte ) receives and weighs one and a package . The clerk believes that they weigh the same and want to save time , but the client insists that all packages must be weighed one by one.  A devious film about life and eternity.
title: Cargo
